long_description: This guide gives backpackers of all levels of experience a resource for discovering by foot more lengthy and rugged journeys in Pennsylvania. Author: Jeff Mitchell. Softcover; 258 pages; maps. Stackpole Books; copyright 2005. Pennsylvania has the most extensive system of backpacking trails of any state east of the Mississippi River. For each of the 37 trails, you'll find information on terrain, difficulty, maps, driving directions, and features to enjoy along the trek.
short_description: This guide gives backpackers of all levels of experience a resource for discovering by foot more lengthy and rugged journeys in Pennsylvania.
